name: Polar Star
ability_detail: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 12~24%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by 10/20/30/48~20/40/60/96%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

name: Thundering Pulse
ability_detail: Increases ATK by 20~40% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by 12/24/40~24/48/80%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack%22s duration is calculated independently.

name: Elegy for the End
ability_detail: A part of the %22Millennial Movement%22 that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60~120. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the %22Millennial Movement: Farewell Song%22 effect for 12s. %22Millennial Movement: Farewell Song%22 increases Elemental Mastery by 100~200 and increases ATK by 20~40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the %22Millennial Movement,%22 buffs of the same type will not stack.

name: Skyward Harp
ability_detail: Increases CRIT DMG by 20~40%. Hits have a 60~100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4~2s.

name: Amos%27 Bow
ability_detail: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8~16% every 0.1 seconds the arrow is in the air for up to 5times.

name: Alley Hunter
ability_detail: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2~4% every second up to a max of 20~40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4~8% per second until it reaches 0%.

name: The Viridescent Hunt
ability_detail: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40~80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14~10s.

name: The Stringless
ability_detail: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24~48%.

name: Sacrificial Bow
ability_detail: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

name: Rust
ability_detail: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40~80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

name: Royal Bow
ability_detail: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

name: Predator
ability_detail:
Effective only on the following platform:
%22PlayStation Network%22
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character%22s Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

name: Prototype Crescent
ability_detail: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36~72% for 10s.

name: Mouun%22s Moon
ability_detail: For every point of the entire party%22s combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

name: Mitternachts Waltz
ability_detail: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20~40% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20~40% for 5s.

name: Hamayumi
ability_detail: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16~32% and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. When the equipping character%22s Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

name: Favonius Warbow
ability_detail: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

name: Compound Bow
ability_detail: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4~8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2~2.4% for 6s. Max 4stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Blackcliff Warbow
ability_detail: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Windblume Ode
ability_detail: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16~32% for 6s.

name: Raven Bow
ability_detail: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12~24%.

name: Recurve Bow
ability_detail: Defeating an opponent restores 8~16% HP.

name: Messenger
ability_detail: Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional 100~200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Sharpshooter%22s Oath
ability_detail: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24~48%.

name: Slingshot
ability_detail: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36~60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

ability_detail: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by 40~80%.

ability_detail: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8~16% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

name: Skyward Atlas
ability_detail: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12~24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160~320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Everlasting Moonglow
ability_detail: Healing Bonus increased by 10~20%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by 1~3.0% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

name: Memory of Dust
ability_detail: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

name: Wine and Song
ability_detail: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate sprint by 14~22% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by 20~40% for 5s.

name: The Widsith
ability_detail:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
Recitative: ATK is increased by 60~120%.
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48~96%.
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240~480.

name: Solar Pearl
ability_detail: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20~40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20~40% for 6s.

ability_detail: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

name: Royal Grimoire
ability_detail: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

name: Prototype Amber
ability_detail: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4~6 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4~6% HP every 2s for this duration.

name: Mappa Mare
ability_detail: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8~16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Hakushin Ring
ability_detail: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a 10~20% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

name: Frostbearer
ability_detail: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Favonius Codex
ability_detail: CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

name: Eye of Perception
ability_detail: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240~360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4times. This effect can occur once every 12~8s.

name: Dodoco Tales
ability_detail:
Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by 16~32% for 6s.
Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by 8~16% for 6s.

ability_detail: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

ability_detail: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1~2% HP.

name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
ability_detail: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24~48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

name: Twin Nephrite
ability_detail: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12~20% for 15s.

name: Amber Catalyst
ability_detail: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by 6~12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

ability_detail: None

ability_detail: Increases all DMG by 8~16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80~160% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

ability_detail: Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

ability_detail: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12~24%.
